About Sonic Drive-In Sonic Drive-In is a Fast Food restaurant located at 1605 Main St in Alamosa, CO . Sonic Drive-In has been described as an Amazing Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 9 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Burgers, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No

Sonic is always good. They usually have pretty fast service and it's definetely cheaper than a lot of other places.

Sonic Drive-In Tips Worst Sonic ever. Forty minutes for four drinks and they still screwed it up. Avoid this location like the plague.
Chad M. Order a Carmel-Banana Malt. It will absolutely blow your mind.
